trans-unit.source: The LegendCollection class is implemented as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Legends%2A> collection property of the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object.
trans-unit.target: 으로 LegendCollection 클래스가 구현 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Legends%2A>루트의 컬렉션 속성 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>개체입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Legends%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend> objects can be appended, inserted or removed from the collection at either design time or run time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend>개체는 추가, 삽입 또는 디자인 타임 또는 런타임에 컬렉션에서 제거할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCollection.Count> property indicates the total number of items in the collection, and is commonly used to find the upper bound of the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCollection.Count>속성 컬렉션에 있는 항목의 총 수를 나타내고 컬렉션의 상한 값을 찾는 데 주로 사용 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCollection.Count>

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend"></xref> object to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 추가 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend"> </xref> 개체 컬렉션의 끝입니다.

trans-unit.source: The name of legend to be added.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the index of the added item.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> 추가 된 항목의 인덱스를 나타내는 값입니다.
